Class att.grappa.DoubleOctagon 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----att.grappa.DrawObject
           |
           +----att.grappa.DrawNode
                   |
                   +----att.grappa.Octagon
                           |
                           +----att.grappa.DoubleOctagon
public class DoubleOctagon
extends Octagon
The DrawObject to use for rendering nodes whose shape is a doubleoctagon. This class is a convenience and is equivalent to an Octagon object with a peripheries attribute of 2.

Version:
1.1, 30 Sep 1999; Copyright 1996 - 1999 by AT&T Corp.
Author:
John Mocenigo, Research @ AT&T Labs

DoubleOctagon()
Construct a double-octagon-shaped DrawObject for nodes.

DoubleOctagon 
 public DoubleOctagon()
Construct a double-octagon-shaped DrawObject for nodes.
